Introduction
This topic contains general information about the reconciliation of VA/DoD/DoT records, including
reconciliation of the VA master record and
military retiree pay files
, and
Reserve Components Common Personnel Data System (RCCPDS) records
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section D - Reconciliation of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), Department of Defense (DoD), and Department of Transportation (DoT) Records
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section D
